NC.Q: Which is larger, the value of Food Production, Agriculture, or Crop Farming?
NC.A: The value of {Food Production} is larger.

NC.A: The value of {Food Production} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which hierarchical path in the sunburst chart makes the largest contribution to the total?
